text: The Malawi national under-17 football team represents Malawi in youth international football completions. They have been to the FIFA U-17 World Cup once in 2009. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-17 World Cup record=== FIFA U-17 World Cup Record FIFA U-17 World Cup Record FIFA U-17 World Cup Record FIFA
